name: The Basement Remastered
description:
STORY

You wake up in the basement, having no clue of whats going on, but you have to escape this basement, the environment doesnt seem right...someone else is here..

INFO

This is the remastered version of the game "The Basement", it was taken down on the gamepage cuz it was made in godot and it wont work, not only this is a remastered but a finished game on unity, more games will come soon with this game engine, and this is my goal to learn and get used to the engine so i can make any type of game i want :3

INSTRUCTIONS

WASD to move

Left click to open doors

Right click to use key's and the crowbar

E to pickup items

F to toggle flashlight

Q to drop items
